Interface Job

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBranchJob, ApplicationLogCleanupJobProvider

    public interface Job

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getKey

        net.nemerosa.ontrack.job.JobKey getKey()

      • getTask

      • getDescription

        java.lang.String getDescription()
        Gets a description for the job

      • isDisabled

        boolean isDisabled()
        Is the job disabled for the next run?

      • isValid

        default boolean isValid()
        This method is called to see if the job is still valid. It is called prior any execution and when collecting the job status. By default, returns true.

        For example, jobs which depend on properties or configurations, can just test the existence of the property or configuration.
